author: Special Correspondent
text:
The additional district munsiff court here directed the ‘Lingaa’ production team to submit the story script by Monday (March 14).

The Madurai-based petitioner Ravi Rathnam’s counsel argued that as the case was that the movie titled ‘Lingaa’ was based on their client’s story – ‘Mullaivanam 999,’ the entire script should be submitted, which alone would facilitate in finding the truth. While the advocates appearing for the Lingaa production team contended that there was no need for submission of the script of ‘Lingaa’, the court, which was hearing the arguments for the last four days, ordered for submission of the script by Monday.
title: Submit ‘Lingaa’ story script: court
